title: In Nevada’s Senate Race, Adam Laxalt Sheds His Political Inheritance
description: His grandfather was among the first Reagan Republicans. Adam Laxalt, the party’s Senate candidate in Nevada, wants to lead a Trumpian future.
dc:creator: Matthew Rosenberg

media:content.media:description: Adam Laxalt, campaigning in Las Vegas, has built a political career on the conservative edge of his party, dividing the state’s political landscape along the way.
